channel.title: How do i make my server nonwild areas?!

item.title: How do i make my server nonwild areas?!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

            sw                 ne                sw                 ne      

if((absX >= 2897 && absX <= 2889  && absY >=9698  && absY <= 9690 ))

sw = SouthWest
ne = NorthEast

item.title: How do i make my server nonwild areas?!
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

i tried adding this into the nonwild place omfg its not working!!! look this is what i added

  1. i searched for nonwild in client.java
  2. i added this with coords etc.
  3. heres the thing i added

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 2897 && absX <= 2889 && absY >=9698 && absY <= 9690 )) return true; else return false; }
